name: @soos-io/soos-sca
description: SOOS Security Analysis CI - Check for vulnerabilities, policy violations and more!

scripts.setup:clean: npx rimraf node_modules && npx rimraf package-lock.json
scripts.check: npm run format && npm run typecheck && npm outdated
scripts.link:soos-api-client: npm link @soos-io/api-client && npm run build && npm link
scripts.patch-api-client: npm run patch && npm run setup:clean && npm install @soos-io/api-client@latest --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ --save-exact && npm install --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ && npm run check

author: SOOS
